p: The pandemic of the coronavirus disease (COVID-19) has quickly spread to affect almost all countries and territories around the world. The agent causing the infection was rapidly detected to be a beta coronavirus, first named the novel coronavirus (2019-nCoV). The International Committee of Taxonomy of Viruses changed the name to severe acute respiratory syndrome-2 (SARS-CoV-2), denoting the coronavirus as causing severe acute respiratory syndrome-2 [ 1].
